Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav made 68 runs off 40 balls
Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma emphasized the importance of strong fielding
South Africa skipper Temba Bavuma stated they prefer not to be labeled as favorites
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma acknowledged India's poor fielding
Kapil Dev suggested Rishabh Pant could replace Dinesh Karthik in the playing XI
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rain delays led to the game being postponed until the next day
Kagiso Rabada took a catch in the field
